comment: It's time for the second winter sale - until December th at am , save % on Infinity R & D Packs ! These packs can open into T6 Ships like the original Constitution class , the Discovery D7 and more ! <URL> <URL>
amr:
# ::snt It's time for the second winter sale - until December th at am , save % on Infinity R & D Packs ! These packs can open into T6 Ships like the original Constitution class , the Discovery D7 and more ! <URL> <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / be-temporally-at-91
            :ARG1 (s / sell-01
                  :ARG1 (p / pack
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Infinity"
                              :op2 "R"
                              :op3 "&"
                              :op4 "D"
                              :op5 "Pack_0"))
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 2)
                  :time (u / until
                        :op1 (d / date-entity
                              :month 12
                              :day 30)))
            :ARG2 (n2 / now))
      :snt2 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (o2 / open-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / pack
                        :mod (t / this))
                  :location (s2 / ship
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "T6")
                        :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                              :ARG2 (a / and
                                    :op1 (c / class
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Constitution")
                                          :mod (o3 / original))
                                    :op2 (s3 / ship
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "D7"))
                                    :op3 (m2 / more)))))))
